title: 26 Carl Paoli: The Key to Success in CrossFit, Freestyle Movement and Human Performance
description: A world class movement/ lifestyle coach joins us today on the The School of Greatness. He does groundbreaking work with the fittest athletes on earth, helping improve mobility, economy of motion and to recover faster from injuries. Not only is he an gymnastics expert, he also has an amazing insights into lifestyle, mindset and total body […]
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
